Developer Terms of Use
des: Be inspired to think big and take action to build a profitable online business. Sigrun is a mastermind business coach, TEDx speaker, and the host of the Sigrun Show podcast. She’s the creator of SOMBA, the MBA program for online entrepreneurs, and in only four years she built a multiple 7 figure lifestyle business. Sigrun shares stories, quotes and case studies on how you can create your own lifestyle business. Start listening today!
